dublin_core.dcvalue: Choosing the right technical platform to support mobile health programming can seem like a daunting task There are a lot of platforms out there and questions of scalability cost ease of use and more can be difficult to navigate We ve profiled a number of technical platforms for you to look through and discover Where possible we ve tried to include hands on video walkthroughs of the tool to provide a clearer context of each tool s capabilities Our tech platform comparison document addresses some of the most important questions to consider when choosing a platform June 2014
MAMA: Technical Platforms for Mobile Messaging
